publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3629 Peter Peacock: Joint Inspection of Children’s Services and Inspection of Social Work Services (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Joint Inspection of Children’s Services and Inspection of Social Work Services (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Robert Brown*

S2M-3629 Peter Peacock: Joint Inspection of Children’s Services and Inspection of Social Work Services (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Joint Inspection of Children’s Services and Inspection of Social Work Services (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Robert Brown
